EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2016-04-07-Turbofest-London.EMAIL-General Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Youâ€™re Invited: Turbofest London
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir or Madam}}: It is my pleasure to cordially invite you to VMTurbo's second annual Turbofest London at The Royal Institution. This afternoon event will be held on Thursday, May 19th at 21 Albemarle St, London W1S 4BS with presentations starting at 1:00 PM. The program features cloud and virtualisation thought leadership discussions, customer keynotes, and an inside look at the 2016 VMTurbo Roadmap. The evening will conclude at 7:00 PM following networking, cocktails, and a science demonstration that is sure to be explosive! Due to space considerations, Turbofest London is limited to the first 100 VIP registrants. I look forward to seeing you there.
<[[http://vmturbo.com/turbofest-london/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=TurbofestLon-Gen&utm_content=04202016]]> Sincerely,
J. Benjamin H. Nye Chief Executive Officer
VMTurbo Inc.
